entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
